content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in santa maria capua vetere on august 1 2018 the court made a decision regarding the costs involved taking into account the shares of inheritance and participation of each party the plaintiffs were awarded a total amount of euro 18000 with the majority going to them and a portion going to the defendants lawyer the defendant was awarded euro 2000 with the majority going to the plaintiffs the court also determined that the costs of the expert witness would be divided between the parties the case involved the division of an estate among the applicants and the defendant the court appointed an expert to identify and describe the assets of the estate which included residential buildings and land the court ordered the estate to be divided among the heirs with specific properties and land allocated to each party the defendant was ordered to pay a balance amount to the applicants the costs of the proceedings were to be borne by the estate with the plaintiffs receiving a larger portion and the defendant receiving a smaller portion the costs of the experts report were also to be borne by the plaintiffs and the defendant

metadata.CASE_ID: Court sec. IV - S.Maria Capua V., 08/01/2018, no. 48
metadata.cost: Euro 16'000.00 compensation per party and 2'000 EUR to the defendant lawyer
